1.content:
Kagome and Inuyasha just had another fight and as usual Kagome runs off and Inuyasha doesn't go after her due to him being a jerk most of the time. Kagome is running though Inuyasha's forest crying. "Damn that Inuyasha, how dare he call me weak, someday i will show him." She stops at the well and looks at the night sky and makes a single wish on a star. "Wish i may, wish i meet, i wish on a star tonight. I wish i was as strong as a demon to show Inuyasha that i'm not a weak person." She jumps down the well and ends up in her era five hundred years into the future* "Get a hold of yourself Kagome star wishing doesn't come true." She lets out a sigh and climbs out of a well, then she walks into her home. "Mom i'm home." No one responds and she figures they are out for the evening so she goes to the bathroom and relaxes in a bath. "Ahh this feels great." After the bath she goes to her room and puts on some pjs and lays in bed as she thinks of the events with Inuyasha.
~Flash back starts~
"Inuyasha you jerk. Why is she here?" Kagome points at Kikyo her rival for Inuyasha's heart and she has a major dislike for Kikyo, kinda the same dislike Sesshoumaru has for his younger brother. Inuyasha yells. "because she is better then you Kagome!" kagome then turns around and yells. "SIT SIT SIT SIT SIT SIT SIT SIT SIT SIT SIT!!!" Which causes Inuyasha to end up in a Inuyasha size hole in the ground about 12 inches deep and she runs off into the forest near the well. ~flash back ends~
Kagome turns on her side and goes to sleep while crying a little but not before saying. "I think i will go see a certain someone when i return to the fedual era." She has a peaceful sleep not knowing her wish is coming true.
What kind of demon does Kagome turn into?
1.title: Wishing on a star

12.content: Which one half or full? now the half demon is unable to transform into a giant cat, but Kagome does get cat ears, a cat tail heighten senses better balance and grace, claws and fangs. But as a half demon she won't be as strong or as fast and her senses won't be as sharp as a full demon. She also acts like a cat when she gives into the feline desires Now as a full demon she still has cat ears and a longer cat tail, sharper claws, and fangs. Way better balance and grace then a half demon feline, able to transform into a giant cat about the size of Sesshoumaru's dog form. Now the true question is which one and how fast does the change happen?
12.title: Cat (full demon or half demon)

125.content:
Well how about something western. Kagome is a reincarnated priestess so her becoming a demon does go against her nature a little bit. Demons can be good, bad, or neutral in Japan, But demon as we in the west know it still gives off this idea of being evil or at least a bit corrupted. But it never said anything about her becoming an Angel. A priestess is already a pretty light spiritual entity in Japanese culture anyway, so what would be a step up? Why an Angel of course! Angels can be very powerful, are mysterious and would be a good contrast to all the demons of feudal japan. Now you have to decide on if you want a good Angel, a bad Angel, or a light or dark Angel. Good & bad are self explanatory. Will Kagome's transformation make her Evil, Cruel, & Mean or will she stay Kind, Sweet, & Good or will she become even KINDER & NICER and become a bit more like Kasumi from Ranma 1/2. Dark or Light means will she be naughty but playful or sweet and innocent looking but still in a hot way. This means that there can be bad light Angels and good dark Angels.

While typing this I thought of a step above Angel. Goddess! Kagome could become something Shinto style like Amaterasu (And be an original creation or the reincarnation/embodiment of an already established Japanese deity (god or goddess) but I was thinking more along the lines of Belldandy from "Oh! My Goddess!" Again the same guidelines fore Angels apply to being a Goddess. Except if she becomes evil she should become a Demoness in the Western sense or the "Oh! My Goddess!" sense.

So them's the options! Pick a winner now!
125.title: you decide:Angel or some other light creature.

13.content:
Kagome was blissfully unaware of her wish coming true.

Her body glowed an illuminating light that bathed every inch of her being, it glowed so bright that it shined out through the window like a beacon, as her body glowed it underwent physical changes.

The first was her dark raven hair, From roots to end it was washed over until it pure white, reflecting the moon in it's glow, her cute face matured and became sharp, her lips reddened until they were as red as blood, her skin turned unnaturally pale, her average B cups swelled into D's, her cute ass enlarged and became firm, her hips widened.

she seemed to grow a bit taller then her average height, almost as tall as her mother, her nails sharpened into claws, including the toe's.

Her eye's opened to reflect red pools as they stared around the room with no hint of intelligence before the body sat up and stood out from the bed just as the glowing had stopped.

What does the new Kagome acting on instincts do?
13.title: Dog (full demon)

133.content:
Kagome stride out of the house in a trance, the cold air of the night biting her exposed skin did little to hamper her journey even as her bare feet stepped on the cold stone flooring as she arrived at the shack containing the well.

She entered and approached the well before dropping in, The light consumed her form before she found herself thrown back in time to the old well, she jumped with new and unnatural agility that she flew right out of the well before landing on the cold grassy dirt, her eye's searched the surrounding forest, her eye's twitched at the sound of forest life around, her nose sniffed the air, smelling the different scents flowing through the air.

what happends next?
133.title: go through the well

15.content: How about a dragoness a female dragon or even a dragoon a dragon knightness If that doesn't interest you maybe your own demon. Now here is what a dragon demon looks like. If kagome becomes a dragon she will grow many fangs razor sharp, very sharp claws, dragon wings from her shoulder blades very painful transformation, she will be able to turn into a dragon. now a dragoon this one is based off of the game Legend Of Dragoon so Squaresoft aka Square Enix owns it. i just couldn't pass it up. Now a Dragoon has thick dragon scale armor which can be red, black, green, purple, aqua, golden brown or white, my personal favorite is red and black. It comes as full body armor no helmet and is able to transform at will the wings are attach to the armor and is able to fly less painful but it puts more stress on the body if used to much for a while at first which could kill Kagome. If that doesn't interest you then maybe if she was a bird demon or even a fox demon.

If Kagome finds a red stone she becomes a red dragoon which has power of fire. if it is green she has power of wind and maybe even nature, if it is white she gets healing powers and powerful light attacks meaning her powers as a priestess is way stronger, if it is black she gets powers over dark arts not the powers of a dark priestess, if it is aqua not doubt about it she gets power over water, if it is purple aka lavender she gets power over lightning, and finally if it is brown power over earth. So you went with red stone meaning power over fire very interesting, now lets get this chapter started.
During the night while everyone is sleep a small meteor is heading for the shrine while Kagome lives at. It doesn't burn up during re-entry and it is red hot but cool to the touch it lands right on Kagome's floor by breaking through her bedroom window. The noise causes kagome to stir a little but she goes back to sleep. The sun raises up and shines brightly in Kagome's room reflected off of the shiny red stone and the light causes Kagome to wake up. "Inuyasha just five more minutes." But the light is doesn't fade away and which causes kagome to get out of bed. "what is this light? I can't see." She then uses her hands to shield her eyes which causes her to see a pretty red stone on the floor. "Huh, how did this get here?" She walks over and picks it up which causes her to be engulfed in a bright light. "Ahh to bright." She shuts her eyes until the light fades away and when the light is gone she is hovering a few inches from the ground as she flaps her new wings and is wearing heavy looking armor that is fire red. In her confusion the armor and wings go away which causes her to fall onto all fours panting. She is wondering. "What just happened? What was with that light/ It felt like i was on fire but i wasn't getting burned." She then opens her hand and stares at the red stone. "Did this stone have anything to do with it?"

While Kagome is sleeping her body starts to change first her hair grows a little longer with natural fire red highlights, then she grows a tail which makes her uncomfortable in her sleep due to her new tail is cramped and confined in her panties and pjs her legs start to get black and red fur, she grows some fangs in her mouth to chew raw meat which she can now eat, her ears become a little pointy which heightens her sense of hearing and the rest of her senses increase aswell. Due to the tail she wakes up and is still unaware of the changes. Kagome walks over to her closet and pulls out her usual school uniform and places it on the bed. In the dead of night, The door to Kagomes mother's room opened without a sound to reveal a dark shadow standing in the open doorway, The dark figure glided in the room with ghost like silence until it stopped just before the bed where an older beautiful woman slept, unaware of the threat leering above her.

155312221.content:
In the dead quiet night, the sleeping occupants of the Higurashi were unaware of the eldest daughter sudden transformation, or that she stalk through the halls like a silent shadow.

The newly transformed Kagome walked out barefooted and in her PJ's, unbothered by the icy floor or the cold wind nipping at her lightly protected body as she made her way into the old storage house were the mystic well was located.

she stopped just before, her bleeding red eye's gazing down in it with an animal like intelligence, then in an amazing feat of ability that she never possessed she flipped forward into the well where a bright light escaped and when it dissipated she was no where to be seen after.

in the past, in the exact same ground where the future Higurashi house would be built one day upon the open small plain where the exact same well was sticking out, a bright light poured out before stopping.

A yellow blur shot out from the well before landing on the cold green grass, Kagome was now in the feudal era again. she was here by her newly born Nebutori demon instincts to find a host to possess.

As she stood there looking into the darkness of the forest, does someone find her or is she free to do what she wants?
155312221.title: Feudal Era

1553122212.content:
No one was around to meet or intercept the new Kagome, Not the half breed dog demon inuyasha who waits upon her most of the time, or Sesshomaru who's recently taken up to being close to the village.

Kagome's demon side sniffed the air in search of prey before a catching onto a unique scent that sent her instincts running wild, she turned her body to the location of her target and quietly stalk in the direction of her chosen victim.

The dirt and cold wet grass did nothing to hamper her as she made her way into an open small plain was a noticeable human sized object laying out of place, she seemed to glade soundlessly towards it, getting a better image as she got closer until the object revealed to be a woman.

But not just any woman. it was....?

who was the luckly victim that Kagome came across?

(The next morning) Kagome woke up to find herself inside Koga den! (W-Wait why am I here?) She thought to herself. "Good Morning Kagome, I hope you slept well?" as Kagome turn to see Koga, as he continue speak "Bring some food for both of us" as he smile bright. "K-Koga what going on? Why am I here?" Kagome asked. Koga look at her in confused way "Kagome what you mean by why are you here, you live here with me and other demon wolfs like us" he reply.

"Wait I not Demon Wolf, I am human!" Kagome said which cause everyone burst out laughing including Koga. "Ha,ha ha, Oh Kagome that is funny you plastic and weak human, you were be as born demon wolf along have amazing ability to scene jewel shard which why we are soulmate now" he said.

Kagome was about say something when Gina bring bowl of water "Here Sis Kagome to wash your face" he said. Kagome gasp when she saw her reflection in bowl of water.

(Oh my gosh I am demon wolf, my wish come true!) Kagome slowly smile and begin wash her face. (OMG My wish come true become demon wolf, but I not like idea be Koga soulmate! Wait min if I was born as demon wolf that mean I never met inuyasha, Shippo,Miroku and Sango!) Kagome thought to herself as she sigh sad.

"Is there something wrong Sis Kagome?." Gina asked. Kagome look at him along rest of demon wolfs. "Oh it nothing!" Kagome reply with smile which make everyone smile including Koga and with that Kagome start eat meat that Koga bring for her and him but after that Koga and her went outside to hunt down jewel shards.

Kagome and Koga found 4 secretly jewel shards! And Koga was very happy about it. "Great Job Kagome we found 4 secret jewel shards but it make me wonder who was the idiot that broke secret jewel which cause it to scatter all of the region?." Koga asked.

( I wonder if someone take my place and did the same thing?) Kagome thought. "I really not know else Koga but look on the bright side? will some of the jewel shard are pack be unstoppable!" She said with smile.

Koga look at Kagome and slowly smirk. "Oh Kagome, I love how you think outside side the box" he reply.

info.brief_description: Kagome makes a wish that changes her forever. Please add to this story, anything goes.
info.description:
Anything goes but boy on boy stuff that is just wrong.
Kagome makes a wish on a star and the wish comes true. What did she wish for? Read and find out. i am a novice writer so i'm not very good with making chapters most of the time.
rules.
1. make it atleast 2 paragraphs long. it isn't that hard to do.
2.Kagome and Sesshoumaru and Shippo and rin must never die Inuyasha he can die i don't like him much because he hurts Kagome by running off to see Kikyo.
3. i love Kagome and Sesshoumaru pairing stories due to Sesshoumaru is a strict and cold gentleman plus i am a fan of him and this way Kagome can get some payback on Inuyasha.
4.if you pair Iunyasha and Kagome together due to anything goes make Inuyasha work for it.
disclaimer: i don't own Inuyasha etc the makers of the anime do
